issue.title: val can't move joints after a fall

content.raw: @scpeters Sorry to hijack the issue to say this, but since you are discussing the rules for scoring after a fall, how will you handle falls due to gazebo/ihmc errors? We're working on getting exact metrics, but quite often our simulation starts and the robot just collapses without starting our code. We are afraid it can happen in the middle of the finals execution.
